info.title: Walrus mainnet API
info.description: This is the new API Module implementation. The Walrus Blockchain API is used to retrieve Walrus Blockchain data. In order to execute queries you need to get API Key and use it in header 'x-api-key'. However, before that you need to sign up on the explorer or company website. If an account is created on the website https://staketab.com/ or https://walruscan.com/, the user will be granted the ROLE_USER role. After that you may fetch API KEY.

get.description: Get a list of all accounts on the Network.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sorting method: from the lowest element to the highest (ASC) or from the highest element to the lowest (DESC).

parameters.name: searchStr
parameters.description: Enter part or full validator name or address to get the queried validator.

get.description: Get a list of all accounts that delegated funds to the queried validator.

get.description: Get a staking history of delegated funds to the queried validator.
